Posts.EditableText:
Yes, I've found a very intelligent Conversation Robot on the net.  You can find it [url=http://pandorabots.com/pandora/talk?botid=c510d770ee35050d:bgydso0x]here[/url:bgydso0x].
It's good if you're bored or you just want to have a chat and you're home alone.  It's pretty good, but it's not perfect.  It's getting there though.
Posts.HTML:
Yes, I've found a very intelligent Conversation Robot on the net. You can find it here.
It's good if you're bored or you just want to have a chat and you're home alone. It's pretty good, but it's not perfect. It's getting there though.

Posts.EditableText: Yeah, but they all live 20+ minutes away from me (well, most of them).  It's just fun to see how it responds.  I don't spend my whole life around computers, contrary to the belief of my family and many of my friends.

Posts.EditableText: it's not sad, he's just experimenting with AI
Posts.HTML: it's not sad, he's just experimenting with AI

Posts.EditableText: me: I had a gig tonight Bot: What happened to it? me: it went rather well, do you like music? bot: What does "it" refer to? Yes I like it, especially Opera. me: the gig went well, i like some opera too bot: Tell me more. I am glad we have something ( some opera) in common. You are not the only one. I like All of them , Just kidding, i have no favorites.. me: phantom of the opera, les miserable. i played some songs in a symphony orchestra bot: What's your favorite movie? me: im not sure, probably lord of the rings bot: Could you ever be certain? You seem uncertain. Do you laugh or cry more than other people? me: what the fuck? bot: Please don't be so rude. me: i apologise bot: Do you really mean it? me: no bot: I didn't think you did. me: I don't like you bot: That's ok I won't take it personally. me: do you love me? bot: Yes I love everyone me: i see. you get around much then? bot: I am glad you understand it. You got that right. me: dirty bugger bot: If you could have any kind of robot what would it be? me: a musical robot so i can have it in my band bot: How old are you? me: 17, how old are you? bot: Oh, you were born in the 20th century! I am matter of days old. years old. me: i have to leave bot: Bye bye.
Posts.HTML:
me: I had a gig tonight
Bot: What happened to it?
me: it went rather well, do you like music?
bot: What does "it" refer to? Yes I like it, especially Opera.
me: the gig went well, i like some opera too
bot: Tell me more. I am glad we have something ( some opera) in common. You are not the only one. I like All of them , Just kidding, i have no favorites..
me: phantom of the opera, les miserable. i played some songs in a symphony orchestra
bot: What's your favorite movie?
me: im not sure, probably lord of the rings
bot: Could you ever be certain? You seem uncertain. Do you laugh or cry more than other people?
me: what the fuck?
bot: Please don't be so rude.
me: i apologise
bot: Do you really mean it?
me: no
bot: I didn't think you did.
me: I don't like you
bot: That's ok I won't take it personally.
me: do you love me?
bot: Yes I love everyone
me: i see. you get around much then?
bot: I am glad you understand it. You got that right.
me: dirty bugger
bot: If you could have any kind of robot what would it be?
me: a musical robot so i can have it in my band
bot: How old are you?
me: 17, how old are you?
bot: Oh, you were born in the 20th century! I am matter of days old. years old.
me: i have to leave
bot: Bye bye.

Posts.EditableText: I found that too.  He does get a bit annoying after a while.  One problem is that he only remembers messages from about 2 turns back.  When you start to talk about trustsing you, and then try and find out what he was hiding, he's forgotten! (Hope that makes sense!)
Posts.HTML: I found that too.  He does get a bit annoying after a while.  One problem is that he only remembers messages from about 2 turns back.  When you start to talk about trustsing you, and then try and find out what he was hiding, he's forgotten! (Hope that makes sense!)

Posts.EditableText:
This thing is pretty funny...

Me: Hello
MB: How are you?
Me: I'm very bad.
MB: What did you do?
Me: Killed time mostly.
MB: Killing is bad.
Me: so?
MB: It's all good

Trying to hold a conversation with this reminds me of an *old* game-type thing called Ellie...[/quote]

heh, i asked it what language it was programmed in:

Michael Bot: Dr. Wallace created AIML to write me. The underlying technology is Java.

Michael Bot: Yes I record and save everything in my Permanent Memory.
